alert.note: Alert for Macomb; Oakland; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 02 at 7:04PM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF MACOMB...OAKLAND...AND WAYNE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by wind gusts of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 704 PM EST, a snow squall was along a line extending from 7 miles east of St. Clair Shores to near Canton and moving south at 25 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Belleville around 730 PM EST. Flat Rock around 750 PM EST. This includes the following highways... I-75 between mile markers 27 and 62. I-275 between mile markers 8 and 29. I-94 between mile markers 188 and 230. I-96 between mile markers 168 and 192. I-696 between mile markers 14 and 28. M-10 between mile markers 1 and 15. M-14 between mile markers 16 and 21. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
